Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 2017...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Colorado on 6/30/2017 (Going to COL: CF R. Acosta, C J. Maldonado. Going to PIT: C H. Cargo, P I. West, P M. Boggs)...
Had first career hit on 4/6/2020, off Julio Teheran (ARI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/17/2020, off Alberto Cabrera (SF)...
Injured on 4/11/2021 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Atlanta on 5/18/2021...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
